description: Registry of known commands with their descriptions, permissions, and risk levels

ls.name: ls
ls.description: List directory contents and file information

risk.reason: Read-only operation, displays file listings
Permanently deletes files, cannot be undone

rm -rf.name: rm -rf
rm -rf.description: Recursively force-remove files and directories without prompting

risk.reason: Recursively deletes entire directory trees without confirmation, extremely destructive

git.name: git
git.description: Version control system for tracking changes in source code

risk.reason: Base git command, fallback for unregistered subcommands
Read-only operation, displays repository status

git diff.name: git diff
git diff.description: Show changes between commits, commit and working tree, etc.

risk.reason: Read-only operation, displays differences
Read-only operation, displays commit history
Branch management, easily reversible

git add.name: git add
git add.description: Add file contents to the staging area

risk.reason: Stages files for commit, reversible with git reset
Creates commits, reversible with git reset

git checkout.name: git checkout
git checkout.description: Switch branches or restore working tree files

risk.reason: Can discard uncommitted changes when used on files

git merge.name: git merge
git merge.description: Join two or more development histories together

risk.reason: Merges branches, may cause conflicts

git rebase.name: git rebase
git rebase.description: Reapply commits on top of another base tip

risk.reason: Rewrites commit history, can be complex to undo

git push.name: git push
git push.description: Update remote refs along with associated objects

risk.reason: Publishes local commits to remote, visible to others

git push --force.name: git push --force
git push --force.description: Force-push to remote, overwriting remote history

risk.reason: Overwrites remote history, can destroy others' work

git reset --hard.name: git reset --hard
git reset --hard.description: Reset working tree and index, discarding all changes

risk.reason: Permanently discards uncommitted changes and resets to target commit

python3.name: python3
python3.description: Python interpreter for running Python scripts

risk.reason: Executes Python code, risk depends on the script being run

python.name: python
python.description: Python interpreter for running Python scripts

risk.reason: Executes Python code, risk depends on the script being run

where.name: where
where.description: Windows command to locate and display file paths of executables

risk.reason: Read-only informational command that searches and displays file paths

winget.name: winget
winget.description: Windows Package Manager CLI for discovering and installing applications

risk.reason: Downloads and installs software, modifying system state

pwsh.name: pwsh
pwsh.description: PowerShell 7 cross-platform shell and scripting language

risk.reason: Executes PowerShell scripts, risk depends on the script being run

powershell.name: powershell
powershell.description: Windows PowerShell (legacy) shell and scripting language

risk.reason: Executes PowerShell scripts, risk depends on the script being run
Read-only navigation command that only changes the shell working directory

echo.name: echo
echo.description: Display text or variables to standard output

risk.reason: Read-only output command, displays text to terminal
